A Power Burst is a brief period where a character gets an extra action each turn and deals more damage; various class abilities grant them.
A Power Strike is a single attack with doubled accuracy, damage, crit, and influence; like a Power Burst, a class can grant them.
Each area has a Zone Tension score that rises with each attack an NPC makes; various abilities rely on this.
